Posts.Content: pamelargalvan wrote: I have never had any issues with my breast before until now. I am a 34 yr old mom and I just had a baby in December and they felt anything at my 6 wk check up. On September 22, 2017 I felt a hard lump on my left breast that hurt but it is in movable. They are supposed to be sending me for a u/s when I am not sure. Should I be worried? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I am a 35 yr old mother who found a lump and worried pamelargalvan Outfield
